SELECT REPLACE(BORD_CLOB, '`', '\`') as BORD ,seq as seq ,'xx' as rr FROM YCH_LOGIN_INFO WHERE seq = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 1) FROM YCH_LOGIN_INFO )
SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 1) AS SEQ FROM YCH_LOGIN_INFO
mapper.update: INSERT INTO YCH_LOGIN_INFO ( SEQ, BORD , BORD_CLOB , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ) + 1 , 1) FROM YCH_LOGIN_INFO ), #{BORD} , #{BORD, jdbcType=CLOB} , sysdate )
INSERT INTO YCH_LOGIN_INFO ( SEQ, BORD_CLOB , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ) + 1 , 1) FROM YCH_LOGIN_INFO ), #{bord}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ AS SEQ , A.BORD_TYPE AS BORD_TYPE , A.TITLE AS TITLE , TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DT , TO_CHAR(A.UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DT FROM PGM_BORD A ORDER BY SEQ DESC
